page.title: 11INTERVIEWS:THORNTON HOUGH
page.content:
A group of children from Thornton Hough Primary School asked 25 people the following questions:
{Q.1"Do you live in Thornton Hough?" A. YES=17 NO=7 NO REPLY=1 {Q.2"Do you shop here?"} A. YES=13 NO=9 NO REPLY=1 {Q.3"Did you go to Thornton Hough {School?" A. YES=6 NO=16 NO REPLY=1 {Q.4"Have you always lived here?"} A. YES=7 NO=15 NO REPLY=1 {Q.5"If not,where did you live?" A. L'POOL=5 W.KIRBY=1 WALLASEY=1 BEBINGTON=2 NEW FERRY=1 NESTON=2 BRIMSTAGE=1 YORKSHIRE=1 S.WALES=1 {Q.6"Do you use the sports facilities?" { }A. YES=7 NO=15 NO REPLY=1 {Q.7"Do you use the bus service?" A. YES=14 NO=10 NO REPLY=1
